text: Yithi (Muhammad): “Hini na bantu! Inene mna ndithunyelwe kuni nonke njengoMthunywa ka-Allâh Olongamelo lwamazulu nomhlaba ilolwaKhe. Akukho thixo wumbi ngaphandle kwaKhe. NguYe Onika ubomi Enze ukufa. Ke kholwani kuAllâh noMthunywa waKhe ongakwazi kufunda nakubhala, (uMthunywa) okholwa kuAllâh namaZwi aKhe (i’Kur’ân), kananjalo mlandeleni yena khon’ukuze nikhokeleleke
